analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xa05f9c81dd0ea941170659ec8d5ef2c1e179308a.sol:
	Contract Perlin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xa05f9c81dd0ea941170659ec8d5ef2c1e179308a.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xa05f9c81dd0ea941170659ec8d5ef2c1e179308a.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.4.20 (/unique_contracts/0xa05f9c81dd0ea941170659ec8d5ef2c1e179308a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xa05f9c81dd0ea941170659ec8d5ef2c1e179308a.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
